title: Sound On: Bezos Blasts Biden Tweet, WH Tariff Decision Soon (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Bezos Blasts Biden Tweet, WH Tariff Decision Soon (Radio)
description:
Today's guests: Clete Willems, Partner at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld and former Deputy Director of the National Economic Council discussed reports that President Biden is set to roll back some Trump tariffs on Chinese imports to fight inflation, Retired Lieutenant Air Force General David Deptula discusses the state of the Ukraine war, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discuss Jeff Bezos's criticism of President Joe Biden's tweet calling for oil executives to reduce gasoline prices and the decision by some 4th of July celebration organizers to forgo performing Tchaikovsky’s "1812 Overture" amid the Ukraine war. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
